menu.description: A hearty sandwich featuring a crispy, golden-fried chicken breast, topped with lettuce, tomato, pickles, and Gary's special sauce on a toasted brioche bun.
Juicy beef patty with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, and pickles on a sesame seed bun. Served with a side of fries.
Fluffy pancakes packed with fresh blueberries, served with maple syrup and a dollop of whipped cream.
Buttermilk-marinated chicken fried to perfection, served with creamy mashed potatoes, gravy, and saut√©ed green beans.
Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Add grilled chicken for $3.00.
Golden fries smothered in homemade chili and melted cheddar cheese. Topped with green onions and a dollop of sour cream.
A wholesome wrap filled with roasted veggies, hummus, mixed greens, and a tangy vinaigrette. Served with a side of fresh fruit.
Beer-battered fish fillets served with crispy fries, tartar sauce, and coleslaw.
Two eggs any style, bacon or sausage, home fries, and a fluffy buttermilk biscuit with sausage gravy.
Creamy milkshake available in chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry, topped with whipped cream and a cherry.
